title: OHS students compete at DECA district conference | News | southernminn.com
text: Looking over the sea of participants chatting and circulating the room in their best business attire, the DECA district conference could have been mistaken for a professional networking event or convention, but the young attendees are still taking their first steps into the business world. kAm~H2E@??2 w:89 $49@@= DEF56?ED AFE E96:C 3FD:?6DD 24F>6?
